content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position: -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position: -5.0, 2.5) - currently out of fuel
- Steam engine (position: 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam
- Small electric poles for power distribution

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: 15.5, 70.5) - currently not receiving electricity
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: 15.5, 72.5) - currently contains 635 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: 15.5, 73.5) - waiting for space in destination
- Transport belt system (positions: 15.5, 74.5 and 16.5, 73.5) connecting to furnace area - currently contains 11 iron ore
- Burner inserter to move iron ore from belt to furnace (position: 17.5, 73.5)
- Stone furnace (position: 19.0, 73.0) - currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Burner inserter for output (position: 20.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for iron plates (position: 21.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move iron plates to belt (position: 22.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Copper Ore Mining and Smelting at Position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position: -46.5, 70.5) - currently not receiving electricity
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position: -46.5, 72.5) - currently contains 742 copper ore
- Burner inserter to move ore from chest to belt (position: -46.5, 73.5) - waiting for space in destination
- Transport belt (position: -46.5, 74.5) connecting to furnace - currently contains 7 copper ore
- Stone furnace (position: -43.0, 73.0) - currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Burner inserter for output (position: -41.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for copper plates (position: -40.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move copper plates to belt (position: -39.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move ore from belt to furnace (position: -44.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to copper cable assembler

### Copper Cable Production at Position(-34.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -34.5, 73.5) with copper cable recipe - currently not receiving electricity
- Burner inserter for input (position: -37.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter for output (position: -31.5, 73.5)
- Wooden chest for copper cables (position: -30.5, 73.5)
- Burner inserter to move copper cables to belt (position: -29.5, 73.5)
- Transport belt connecting to circuit assembler

### Electronic Circuit Production at Position(-19.5, 60.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 (position: -19.5, 60.5) with electronic circuit recipe - currently not receiving electricity
- Burner inserter for iron plate input (position: -21.5, 60.5)
- Burner inserter for copper cable input (position: -17.5, 60.5)
- Burner inserter for output (position: -19.5, 62.5)
- Wooden chest for electronic circuits (position: -19.5, 63.5)
- Transport belt network connecting from iron plates and copper cables

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities where other entities already exist
- Before placing an inserter or belt, check if there's already an entity at that location
